Wyll_Brewery.synopsis: Party banter between Halsin and Wyll on entering the Brewery in TWN

Gale_Mausoleum.synopsis: Party banter between Halsin and Gale in the Thorm Mausoleum

Shadowheart_SCL.synopsis: Party banter between Halsin and Shadwoheart in the forests of SCL

Gale_WyrmsRock.synopsis: Party banter between Halsin and Gale on seeing Wyrm's Rock

Karlach_Moonrise.synopsis: Party banter between Halsin and Karlach on reaching Moonrise Towers

Karlach_SorcerousSundries.synopsis: Party banter between Halsin and Karlach in Sorcerous Sundries

Karlach_MasonsGuild.synopsis: Party banter between Halsin and Karlach at the Mason's Guild

Wyll_LastLightShrine.synopsis: Party Banter between Halsin and Wyll on finding the Selune Shrine under Last Light

Jaheira_Park.synopsis: Party banter between halsin and Jaheira in the Lower city Park

Gale_ReithwinTown.synopsis: PB between Halsin and Gale in Town in SCL

Wyll_TadpolingCenter.synopsis: Party banter between Halsin and Wyll in the Tadpoling Center

Laezel_CountingHouse.synopsis: Party banter between Halsin and Lae'zel at the Counting House

Astarion_ROM_Act3_Ascendant.synopsis: Halsin expresses concern that Astarion is too controlling in his relationship with the player

Karlach_Lodge.synopsis: Party banter for Halsin and Karlach at the Lodge in Lower City

Karlach_MoonriseSCE.synopsis: Party banter between Halsin and Karlach in the Moonrise Throne Room at SCE

Karlach_BlushingMermaid.synopsis: Party banter between Halsin and Karlach in Blushing Mermaid

Karlach_MorphicPool.synopsis: Banter between Halsin and Karlach at the Morphic pool

Astarion_WaterQueen.synopsis: Party banter between Halsin and Astarion in the Water Queens House

Gale_LastLight.synopsis: Party banter between Halsin and Gale in Last Light while the shield is up

Wyll_MoonrisePrison.synopsis: Party banter between Halsin and Wyll in Moonrise Prison

Shadowheart_SteelWatchFoundry.synopsis: Party banter for Halsin and Astarion at the Steel Watch Foundry

Karlach_LastLightFallen.synopsis: Party banter between Halsin and Karlach on finding Last Light overrun by shadows. Anyone who was present within succumbed to the shadow curse.

Shadowheart_SharTemple.synopsis: Party banter between Halsin and Shadowheart on reaching Shar Temple

Wyll_Brewery_0.speaker: Halsin
Wyll_Brewery_0.text: The scent of hops and barley is most persistent here, even after all this time.

Wyll_Brewery_3.speaker: Wyll
Wyll_Brewery_3.text: Enough to make me thirsty, even. I've always preferred wine to whiskey and ale, but I certainly wouldn't turn away a full flagon right about now.

Wyll_Brewery_2.speaker: Halsin
Wyll_Brewery_2.text: After the shadow curse, I became overly fond of honey mead and melancholy evenings by myself. Now I rarely imbibe - only on the most special of occasions.

Wyll_Brewery_1.speaker: Wyll
Wyll_Brewery_1.text: I say we put an end to your dry spell. Once Ketheric falls, the first round's on me.

Gale_Mausoleum_3.speaker: Halsin
Gale_Mausoleum_3.text: I never favoured tombs - nothing but vanity. Upon death, mortal remains should be returned to nature, to nourish and replenish itself.

Gale_Mausoleum_2.speaker: Halsin
Gale_Mausoleum_2.text: To seal away that which a person no longer needs is to lessen the Oak Father's bounty for all.

Gale_Mausoleum_0.speaker: Gale
Gale_Mausoleum_0.text: I'm not sure Ketheric Thorm would prove the most bounteous of bodies...
Gale_Mausoleum_0.context: NodeContext: Doesn't think much of Ketheric, who for context is a ressurected servant of the god of the dead

Gale_Mausoleum_1.speaker: Halsin
Gale_Mausoleum_1.text: Yes, you are right. He is one sort I would rather seal away forever, to prevent his rot from causing any further harm.

Shadowheart_SCL_2.speaker: Halsin
Shadowheart_SCL_2.text: Once, you could hear nature's symphony in this place. Now it is quiet. Quiet and dead.

Shadowheart_SCL_1.speaker: Shadowheart
Shadowheart_SCL_1.text: I can make some animal noises, if it'll make you feel more at home.

Shadowheart_SCL_0.speaker: Halsin
Shadowheart_SCL_0.text: You bleat well enough as it is.

Gale_WyrmsRock_2.speaker: Halsin
Gale_WyrmsRock_2.text: Brickwork and stonework - this place is far out of balance with nature. But the Oak Father will reclaim this all, eventually.
Gale_WyrmsRock_2.context: NodeContext: Mild displeasure at the city

Gale_WyrmsRock_3.speaker: Gale
Gale_WyrmsRock_3.text: Not too soon, I hope. I've a craving for a soft bed, a hot bath and a large glass of Arabellan Dry - none of which I've ever found hidden under a log.

Gale_WyrmsRock_0.speaker: Halsin
Gale_WyrmsRock_0.text: You may thrive, but what of other life? A city is no place for wild creatures.
Gale_WyrmsRock_0.context: NodeContext: Mild displeasure at the city

Gale_WyrmsRock_1.speaker: Gale
Gale_WyrmsRock_1.text: City's teem with life. Rats, pigeons, flies - they count no less, for all their more pestilent qualities.
Gale_WyrmsRock_1.context: NodeContext: A bit smug - thinks he's won the argument

Wyll_ROM_Act3_0.speaker: Halsin
Wyll_ROM_Act3_0.text: Very quick to say 'forever' to your newly betrothed, weren't you, Blade?

Wyll_ROM_Act3_1.speaker: Wyll
Wyll_ROM_Act3_1.text: Forever could be tomorrow. Better to promise to do your utmost, as long as you have the moments left to share.

Wyll_ROM_Act3_2.speaker: Halsin
Wyll_ROM_Act3_2.text: Scant few times I've seen youthful partnerships end well, but if anyone was formed to thrive in one, I think it may be you.

Shadowheart_ROM_Act3_Selune_0.speaker: Halsin
Shadowheart_ROM_Act3_Selune_0.text: I heard you learnt how to swim, Shadowheart - well done.

Shadowheart_ROM_Act3_Selune_1.speaker: Halsin
Shadowheart_ROM_Act3_Selune_1.text: You know, if you and your love ever wish to enjoy the waters with me, I could attempt a kelpie... or even a porpoise.

Shadowheart_ROM_Act3_Selune_2.speaker: Shadowheart
Shadowheart_ROM_Act3_Selune_2.text: Depends, are you buoyant? I may need a life preserver if I get in over my head.
Shadowheart_ROM_Act3_Selune_2.context: NodeContext: Playful. Arc: SH has rejected Shar

Astarion_ROM_Act3_Spawn_1.speaker: Halsin
Astarion_ROM_Act3_Spawn_1.text: Astarion, I am astonished. To relish in intimacy again after such hardship is a wound many never recover from.

Astarion_ROM_Act3_Spawn_0.speaker: Astarion
Astarion_ROM_Act3_Spawn_0.text: Are you charging for this sage advice, or is sticking your nose into my business just a hobby?

Astarion_ROM_Act3_Spawn_2.speaker: Halsin
Astarion_ROM_Act3_Spawn_2.text: Jest all you will. I believe now in your honest heart.

Karlach_Moonrise_2.speaker: Halsin
Karlach_Moonrise_2.text: This fortress was a seat of the High Heralds, I believe. Long gone from here, of course.

Karlach_Moonrise_1.speaker: Halsin
Karlach_Moonrise_1.text: A council of intellectuals, respected throughout Faerûn - leading authorities on heraldry of course, but also history, genealogy, and diplomacy.

Karlach_Moonrise_3.speaker: Karlach
Karlach_Moonrise_3.text: Seems like diplomacy failed, if they allowed Ketheric Thorm to take over - twice.

Karlach_SorcerousSundries_0.speaker: Halsin
Karlach_SorcerousSundries_0.text: This place reminds me of a magpie's nest. Random baubles, doodahs, and what-have-yous, all jumbled together without a care.

Karlach_SorcerousSundries_2.speaker: Karlach
Karlach_SorcerousSundries_2.text: Fun, right? Who knows what you could find.

Karlach_SorcerousSundries_1.speaker: Halsin
Karlach_SorcerousSundries_1.text: Danger, going by past experience. A cursed tome. An unstable spell. A haunted poppet...

Karlach_SorcerousSundries_3.speaker: Karlach
Karlach_SorcerousSundries_3.context: NodeContext: chatning it like 'hope we find one'

Karlach_MasonsGuild_2.speaker: Halsin
Karlach_MasonsGuild_2.text: I knew one of Reithwin's head masons. She was a good woman, and strong as an ox.

Karlach_MasonsGuild_1.speaker: Karlach
Karlach_MasonsGuild_1.text: Really? Are strong women your type, Halsin?

Karlach_MasonsGuild_3.speaker: Halsin
Karlach_MasonsGuild_3.text: I don't discriminate against any type.

Karlach_MasonsGuild_0.speaker: Karlach
Karlach_MasonsGuild_0.text: Truly a bear man of the people.
Karlach_MasonsGuild_0.context: NodeContext: REspoindg to Halsin saying he's no longer available for romance

Wyll_LastLightShrine_1.speaker: Halsin
Wyll_LastLightShrine_1.text: A shrine of Selûne, tucked away like an unsprouted seed.

Wyll_LastLightShrine_0.speaker: Wyll
Wyll_LastLightShrine_0.text: Another nature metaphor? I admire your consistency, Halsin.

Wyll_LastLightShrine_2.speaker: Halsin
Wyll_LastLightShrine_2.text: When you care about something deeply enough, it consumes every thought and word.

Jaheira_Park_2.speaker: Halsin
Jaheira_Park_2.text: Ah, a glimpse of nature. Like a sip of water to parched lips, eh, Jaheira?

Jaheira_Park_3.speaker: Jaheira
Jaheira_Park_3.text: Baldurians think all druids to be hay-haired idlers, Halsin. Perhaps we ought not speak of nature - but high art, or politics?
Jaheira_Park_3.context: NodeContext: 'change the record, all these city-folk think we're hippies as it is.' A little tongue in cheek, she agrees with him entirely.

Jaheira_Park_0.speaker: Halsin
Jaheira_Park_0.text: I think on them also. But nothing matches the splendour of an ancient tree.

Jaheira_Park_1.speaker: Jaheira
Jaheira_Park_1.text: It is so. And, should one favour bear-form, that tree in particular makes for excellent back-scratching...
Jaheira_Park_1.context: NodeContext: Idle, teasing - offering up a direct tip to Halsin under the guise of a hypothetical.

Gale_ReithwinTown_0.speaker: Halsin
Gale_ReithwinTown_0.text: To think, long ago, the druids feared this market town would grow into a city, and threaten nature's realm... little did we realise what the true threat was.

Gale_ReithwinTown_2.speaker: Gale
Gale_ReithwinTown_2.text: Divination is a skill few can master. The rest of us must simply muddle along, content to view the past with a clarity the future rarely offers.
Gale_ReithwinTown_2.context: NodeContext: 'Divination' is a specific school of magic. Slightly melancholic here - Gale sees the mistakes in his own past more clearly now

Gale_ReithwinTown_1.speaker: Halsin
Gale_ReithwinTown_1.text: Perhaps I can yet turn hindsight into foresight - provided the curse is lifted. A better way for all.

Wyll_TadpolingCenter_2.speaker: Halsin
Wyll_TadpolingCenter_2.text: So many unfortunates must have been infected in this place. Imagine the horrors...

Wyll_TadpolingCenter_0.speaker: Wyll
Wyll_TadpolingCenter_0.text: I don't need to imagine. I've got the souvenir in my skull to prove it.

Wyll_TadpolingCenter_1.speaker: Halsin
Wyll_TadpolingCenter_1.text: Of couse, thoughtless of me, my apologies. But at least you cannot be infected twice... or at least, I hope not.

Laezel_CountingHouse_2.speaker: Halsin
Laezel_CountingHouse_2.text: Such hoarding of wealth. A tomb for riches that could be put to better use.

Laezel_CountingHouse_0.speaker: Lae'zel
Laezel_CountingHouse_0.text: I've heard the same said of bears - the kind you take the shape of. They hoard, gorge, and hibernate through hard times.

Laezel_CountingHouse_1.speaker: Halsin
Laezel_CountingHouse_1.text: True... but only until the thaw, then life goes on. This gold may never see daylight again, while others go cold and hungry.

Astarion_ROM_Act3_Ascendant_2.speaker: Halsin
Astarion_ROM_Act3_Ascendant_2.text: To give oneself wholly, and to have a lover totally in your thrall...? A harmless game, until it becomes real. I worry for the two of you, Astarion.

Astarion_ROM_Act3_Ascendant_1.speaker: Halsin
Astarion_ROM_Act3_Ascendant_1.text: For your sake, I hope some of it is just a fantasy, deep in your heart.

Astarion_ROM_Act3_Ascendant_0.speaker: Astarion
Astarion_ROM_Act3_Ascendant_0.text: Must you take everything so seriously? We're both happy with our arrangement - that's all that matters.

Karlach_Lodge_3.speaker: Halsin
Karlach_Lodge_3.text: There is an admirable harmony to the Society of Brilliance. Beings of all sorts, united in the pursuit of intellect...

Karlach_Lodge_1.speaker: Halsin
Karlach_Lodge_1.text: Hailing from the Underdark can dampen one's sense of fun, I will admit. Down there, noises such as laughter tend to attract predators.

Karlach_Lodge_0.speaker: Karlach
Karlach_Lodge_0.text: Sounds like a place I used to know...

Gale_ROM_Act3_4.speaker: Gale
Gale_ROM_Act3_4.text: Halsin, you must have accumulated considerable wisdom on matters of the heart in your long life.

Gale_ROM_Act3_2.speaker: Gale
Gale_ROM_Act3_2.text: Anything you'd like to pass on to a strapping, love-struck wizard such as myself?

Gale_ROM_Act3_1.speaker: Halsin
Gale_ROM_Act3_1.text: Dispensing advice on matters of the heart would be like swapping boots - what suits me may be a poor fit for you.

Gale_ROM_Act3_3.speaker: Gale
Gale_ROM_Act3_3.text: Ah. Well, there's no faulting that logic. At least you didn't tell me to 'be myself'.
Gale_ROM_Act3_3.context: NodeContext: Accepting the answer. Thinks 'be yourself' is naff advice

Gale_ROM_Act3_0.speaker: Halsin
Gale_ROM_Act3_0.text: Oh no, perish the thought. That can be outright cruel advice to offer in certain cases.

Shadowheart_ROM_Act3_Shar_3.speaker: Halsin
Shadowheart_ROM_Act3_Shar_3.text: I heard what took place at Selûne's shrine, Shadowheart. Was such defilement truly necessary?

Shadowheart_ROM_Act3_Shar_2.speaker: Shadowheart
Shadowheart_ROM_Act3_Shar_2.text: Lady Shar demanded an offering, and I provided. Are you truly that scandalised, Halsin?
Shadowheart_ROM_Act3_Shar_2.context: NodeContext: Nonchalant. Arc: SH is loyal to Shar

Shadowheart_ROM_Act3_Shar_0.speaker: Shadowheart
Shadowheart_ROM_Act3_Shar_0.text: Sounds like jealousy, to me. I couldn't risk your wild side getting too excited at the scent of blood...
Shadowheart_ROM_Act3_Shar_0.context: NodeContext: Teasing. Arc: SH is loyal to Shar

Karlach_MoonriseSCE_2.speaker: Halsin
Karlach_MoonriseSCE_2.text: I can only hope we still find time to vanquish the curse. I can think of little else.

Karlach_MoonriseSCE_0.speaker: Karlach
Karlach_MoonriseSCE_0.text: You can talk of little else too.

Karlach_MoonriseSCE_4.speaker: Halsin
Karlach_MoonriseSCE_4.text: I make no apologies for knowing what is important to me.

Karlach_MoonriseSCE_5.speaker: Halsin
Karlach_MoonriseSCE_5.text: We have lifted the shadow curse, but a new challenge awaits us.

Karlach_MoonriseSCE_6.speaker: Karlach
Karlach_MoonriseSCE_6.text: Baldur's Gate - we can't get there soon enough.

Karlach_MoonriseSCE_1.speaker: Halsin
Karlach_MoonriseSCE_1.text: I am... less anxious to find myself in a city. So removed from nature's power - I do not know how I will fare.

Karlach_MoonriseSCE_3.speaker: Karlach
Karlach_MoonriseSCE_3.text: Stick with me. I'll show you around and square up if anyone bothers you.

Karlach_BlushingMermaid_0.speaker: Halsin
Karlach_BlushingMermaid_0.text: You and I may struggle to go unnoticed in such environs, Karlach.
Karlach_BlushingMermaid_0.context: NodeContext: Some apprehension. In a low-rent tavern

Karlach_BlushingMermaid_2.speaker: Karlach
Karlach_BlushingMermaid_2.text: True enough. Hard to hide pretty under a bushel.

Karlach_BlushingMermaid_1.speaker: Halsin
Karlach_BlushingMermaid_1.text: I meant more in terms of size. Folk of our stature can be a lure for drunkards seeking a brawl, I have found.
Karlach_BlushingMermaid_1.context: NodeContext: Some apprehension. In a low-rent tavern

Karlach_MorphicPool_2.speaker: Halsin
Karlach_MorphicPool_2.text: I cannot help but feel that destiny is tightening its grip on our forward path.
Karlach_MorphicPool_2.context: NodeContext: Aware the end is close

Karlach_MorphicPool_1.speaker: Karlach
Karlach_MorphicPool_1.text: Win or lose, we're nearly there, right?

Karlach_MorphicPool_3.speaker: Halsin
Karlach_MorphicPool_3.text: Indeed. But I just wanted to take the chance to say - it has been a pleasure, Karlach.

Karlach_MorphicPool_0.speaker: Karlach
Karlach_MorphicPool_0.text: The feeling's highly mutual, bear man.

Karlach_ROM_Act3_1.speaker: Halsin
Karlach_ROM_Act3_1.text: Nature affords us few greater powers of healing than what love can provide, Karlach.

Karlach_ROM_Act3_0.speaker: Halsin
Karlach_ROM_Act3_0.text: I was concerned that your pursuit of a cure might cloud your final days. I am glad I was wrong.

Karlach_ROM_Act3_2.speaker: Karlach
Karlach_ROM_Act3_2.text: Me too. Even with so much at stake... in this little heart of mine, I've never been happier.

Astarion_WaterQueen_0.speaker: Halsin
Astarion_WaterQueen_0.text: What do you know of Umberlee, Astarion?

Astarion_WaterQueen_3.speaker: Astarion
Astarion_WaterQueen_3.text: Oh, lots. Rhymes with 'under-sea' for one thing. Fitting, eh?

Astarion_WaterQueen_2.speaker: Halsin
Astarion_WaterQueen_2.text: I... I suppose it is, yes. But perhaps do not refer to her as such - she is a vengeful, capricious goddess. Who knows what may cause her ire.

Astarion_WaterQueen_1.speaker: Astarion
Astarion_WaterQueen_1.text: But she's fine with 'the Bitch Queen'? Give her some credit, Halsin.

Gale_LastLight_2.speaker: Halsin
Gale_LastLight_2.text: Last Light Inn - hearth aglow and lanterns lit, just like a hundred years ago!

Gale_LastLight_0.speaker: Gale
Gale_LastLight_0.text: I imagine the vista was more idyllic back then. As were its patrons' chances of surviving the walk home.

Gale_LastLight_1.speaker: Halsin
Gale_LastLight_1.text: Still though, when you are expecting nothing but desolation, even a small glimmer of hope fills the heart.

Wyll_MoonrisePrison_2.speaker: Halsin
Wyll_MoonrisePrison_2.text: I am loathe to see anyone behind bars. It reminds me of my time as a guest of the goblins.

Wyll_MoonrisePrison_3.speaker: Wyll
Wyll_MoonrisePrison_3.text: That reminds me - how in the Nine Hells could goblins capture a chap as well-muscled as you?

Wyll_MoonrisePrison_1.speaker: Halsin
Wyll_MoonrisePrison_1.text: Poor choice of companions, for one thing - gladly rectified, since then.

Wyll_MoonrisePrison_0.speaker: Halsin
Wyll_MoonrisePrison_0.text: Besides, a large-enough pack of scavengers can take down even the strongest of bears.

Shadowheart_SteelWatchFoundry_2.speaker: Halsin
Shadowheart_SteelWatchFoundry_2.text: The birthing ground of those steel monstrosities. I would feel little sorrow if this place should close forever.
Shadowheart_SteelWatchFoundry_2.context: NodeContext: Some disdain (in a factory making robo-sentries)

Shadowheart_SteelWatchFoundry_3.speaker: Shadowheart
Shadowheart_SteelWatchFoundry_3.text: Oh come on, you have to be at least a little impressed by the craftsmanship. There's only so much you can do with wood.

Shadowheart_SteelWatchFoundry_0.speaker: Halsin
Shadowheart_SteelWatchFoundry_0.text: Not so, in my experience. There is little I cannot whittle.

Shadowheart_SteelWatchFoundry_1.speaker: Shadowheart
Shadowheart_SteelWatchFoundry_1.text: Did you do that on purpose...?

Karlach_LastLightFallen_2.speaker: Halsin
Karlach_LastLightFallen_2.text: All gone... devoured by the shadows. Oak Father preserve us, it's just like a hundred years ago.
Karlach_LastLightFallen_2.context: NodeContext: Aghast at the loss of life/instantly brought back to a similar incident years ago when his comrades died.

Karlach_LastLightFallen_1.speaker: Karlach
Karlach_LastLightFallen_1.text: Stay strong, bear man. We're still here.

Karlach_LastLightFallen_0.speaker: Halsin
Karlach_LastLightFallen_0.text: We are. Yet there is a burden to being the survivor... the witness to others' tragedies. It only grows heavier with time.

Shadowheart_SharTemple_1.speaker: Halsin
Shadowheart_SharTemple_1.text: I daresay you are no longer comfortable in this place, Shadowheart.

Shadowheart_SharTemple_3.speaker: Shadowheart
Shadowheart_SharTemple_3.text: That's an understatement if I ever heard one.
Shadowheart_SharTemple_3.context: NodeContext: Arc: SH has abandoned Shar.

Shadowheart_SharTemple_6.speaker: Halsin
Shadowheart_SharTemple_6.text: True. But you are among friends. Whatever lies ahead, we shall face it together.

Shadowheart_SharTemple_0.speaker: Shadowheart
Shadowheart_SharTemple_0.context: NodeContext: Arc: SH has abandoned Shar.

Shadowheart_SharTemple_4.speaker: Halsin
Shadowheart_SharTemple_4.text: Shar's armies of destruction arose from within these halls.

Shadowheart_SharTemple_2.speaker: Shadowheart
Shadowheart_SharTemple_2.text: Those who do not listen to the reason of Lady Shar words must instead feel the keenness of her blade.
Shadowheart_SharTemple_2.context: NodeContext: Arc: SH is loyal to Shar

Shadowheart_SharTemple_7.speaker: Halsin
Shadowheart_SharTemple_7.text: You sound like a student - reciting words for a test without considering their meaning.

Shadowheart_SharTemple_5.speaker: Shadowheart
Shadowheart_SharTemple_5.text: I've considered them plenty. Besides, Lady Shar favours action over words. Try it out, sometime.
Shadowheart_SharTemple_5.context: NodeContext: Arc: SH is loyal to Shar
